name: triangle
description: A pointy shape with 3 sides - perfect for making mountains and pizza slices!
funFact: Triangles are super strong! That's why bridges use them.

name: square
description: A perfect box shape with 4 equal sides - like a window or a chocolate bar!
funFact: Squares are great for building blocks because they stack so nicely!

name: circle
description: A round, rolly shape with no corners - like a ball or a cookie!
funFact: Circles can roll forever! That's why wheels are circular.

name: star
description: A twinkly shape with pointy arms - just like stars in the night sky!
funFact: Stars in the sky are actually giant balls of gas, not pointy shapes!

name: heart
description: A lovey shape that means you care - perfect for Valentine's day!
funFact: Hearts are the symbol of love all around the world!

name: oval
description: A stretched-out circle - like an egg or a racing track!
funFact: Eggs are oval so they don't roll out of bird nests easily!

name: rectangle
description: A long box shape - perfect for doors, books, and smartphones!
funFact: Most screens you look at are rectangles!
